content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
### Furnace for Iron Plate Smelting at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
• Furnace (at Position(5.0, 5.0)) used to smelt iron ore combined with coal into iron plates.

### Copper Furnace for Copper Plate Smelting at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
• Furnace (at Position(-27.0, -60.0)) used to smelt copper ore and coal into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities API Misuse
  – Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. ‘radius’) or positional arguments not supported by get_entities. Check the function signature before calling.

• Lab Placement Without Inventory Check
  – Verify that a Lab is available in inventory before attempting to place one, to prevent placement errors.

• Crafting Lab with Insufficient Ingredients
  – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, and electronic-circuits) are available or producible. Validate the resource chain before initiating Lab crafting.

• Iterating Over a NoneType Result
  – Confirm that any result from functions returning entity lists is not None before iterating, avoiding errors from NoneType objects.
